response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This remarkable item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and unparalleled craftsmanship. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would significantly enhance your lifestyle or business operations.

We are offering this extraordinary product to you at a special introductory price of $999,000. This offer represents an incredible saving compared to the market value and is a chance for you to own something truly special at a highly favorable rate.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We understand that decisions of this nature require careful consideration, so we are here to provide any additional information or answer any questions you might have.

Looking forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your life,
Alice", "product_price": 999000}
